attributes.review: I hate to give this app only one star but I just have to. I am a HUGE trump supporter and I have a flag pole in my front yard and I fly my 2020 Trump flag on it everyday but not lately because AN HOUR after i downloaded this app, MY FLAGPOLE FELL ON TOP OF MY CAR AND SHATTERED THE WINDSHIELD!!!!!🤬🤬🤬 I am so mad!!!!!! Do NOT get the karma app!!!!
attributes.title: THIS APP IS BAD LUCK!!!!DO NOT DOWLOAD!!!

attributes.review: It was like watching a pale Jabba the Hutt get dry humped by his entourage of white trash ‘merica poodles.
attributes.title: TrumpHumpers Anonymous

attributes.review: This app is actually giving me cancer and shrinking my peen size
attributes.title: Cancer

attributes.review: I just thought I’d be like my fellow Americans and download this lovely app. I regret it. The app started slowing my phone down greatly; and I didn’t even open it. Every time I try to delete the app, it takes me back to when I first downloaded it. I’m stuck in this endless loop. I don’t even know if my review will be seen. If you are reading this, DO 👏🏽 NOT 👏🏽 DOWNLOAD 👏🏽 THIS 👏🏽 APP!!! Proceed with caution if you choose to download it! I don’t know how long I’ve been repeating the same day! It’s scaring me! It feels like Groundhog’s Day but worse. Help! 😭
attributes.title: App keeps me stuck in time

attributes.review: EVERYTHING about this app was so horrible 😖 the second it finished downloading my phone completely shut down, went blackout, and after seventeen minutes of trying to turn it on it finally started up and was playing carmelldansen and flashing so many different colors 😱 idk what that was about but when I unlocked my phone the app had wiped my phone completely !!! All of my photos, music, and apps! All gone!! All that was left was this app so I opened it knowing I must still show our 💖 trumpy-pie 💖 my support 🥰 but when I the app loaded it was all in Russian or maybe South Chinese 😧 idk which bc I can’t read them 😌✨🌸 anyways I got a notification asking if I wanted foreign intelligence to spy on me through my camera 📸 and microphone 🎤 so that they could better manipulate the 2020 election??? 🤯 absolutely insane that foreign spies made an app that disguised itself as the official way to support trump just so they could steal our information ‼️‼️ they’re so sneakyyy 😜
attributes.title: This app HACKED my phone and it blew up 🤯

attributes.review: ugh i saw this app hoping it would be good but i saw the orange cheeto puff and i was blinded, sometimes i envy hellen keller😣💔 i hate this app with a passion i honestly feel bad for these reviews, hah just kidding i hate this app, i didn’t want to see an orange on here 🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: read it please 😻🤟
